Package br.ufrn.imd.dao

Class PlaylistDao

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.dao.PlaylistDao
public class PlaylistDao extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing interactions with the files that store the playlists.
Since:
3/12/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Davi Matias, Jose Maia

    • listPlaylists

      public ArrayList<Playlist> listPlaylists()
      Method that lists all the playlists.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with all the playlists.

    • createPlaylist

      public Playlist createPlaylist(User owner, String playlistName, ArrayList<Music> songs)
      Method that creates a playlist with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      owner - The vip user that owns the playlist.
      playlistName - The name of the playlist to be created.
      songs - An ArrayList with the playlist's songs.
      Returns:
      The Playlist that was created.

    • addMusicsToPlaylist

      public void addMusicsToPlaylist(Playlist p, ArrayList<Music> songs)
      Method that adds specific songs to a playlist.
      Parameters:
      p - The playlist where the songs will be added.
      songs - An ArrayList with the songs to be added.

    • removeMusicsFromPlaylist

      public void removeMusicsFromPlaylist(Playlist p, ArrayList<Music> songs)
      Method that removes specific songs from a playlist.
      Parameters:
      p - The playlist where the songs will be removed.
      songs - An ArrayList with the songs to be removed.

    • loadPlaylist

      public Playlist loadPlaylist(int id)
      Method that loads a specific playlist.
      Parameters:
      id - The playlist's id.
      Returns:
      The loaded playlist.

    • readPlaylistsFromLine

      public ArrayList<Playlist> readPlaylistsFromLine(BufferedReader readingPoint)
      Method that reads playlists from a file line.
      Parameters:
      readingPoint - The point to be readed in the file.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with the playlists.

    • loadPlaylistsOfUser

      public ArrayList<Playlist> loadPlaylistsOfUser(User user)
      Method that loads the playlists of a vip user.
      Parameters:
      user - The vip user that owns the playlists to be loaded.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with the loaded playlists.
